response.overview: Electric Silence unfolds in a virtual space where a black sphere hovers in the distance. Slowly, the camera advances, drawing the viewer into its gravitational pull. As the sphere grows closer, crystalline structures and prismatic surfaces begin to emerge, revealing the outer shell of a digital world under construction. The camera moves inside, passing through darkness into a glowing neural network. Circuits branch and connect, suggesting a consciousness forming within.
response.title: Electric Silence
